e083d7cd-9c4d-4ad6-8956-53f79f0ef143.name: 战斗反射
e083d7cd-9c4d-4ad6-8956-53f79f0ef143.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

3b408776-a433-4898-8665-10c861ba6332.name: 健康
3b408776-a433-4898-8665-10c861ba6332.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

45265709-9d22-46fa-91b7-4b5753a7a88c.name: 高痛阈
45265709-9d22-46fa-91b7-4b5753a7a88c.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

52014abe-ee32-4a60-9103-0e4382a925e5.name: 幸运
52014abe-ee32-4a60-9103-0e4382a925e5.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

2c5b9747-0a94-43a0-836b-5880364bf292.name: 可选增益
2c5b9747-0a94-43a0-836b-5880364bf292.notes: 在天赋对应的技能检定失败后的避免遭受伤害的 HT 检定上获得加值

d458c73b-9756-4123-89b5-d66f2f752ea3.name: Contact Specialist
d458c73b-9756-4123-89b5-d66f2f752ea3.notes: Delete Cartography, Geography, and Survival skills [-8].
